item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Barry Eisler
item.description: "...savoring the sense of loneliness and freedom that comes only from solitary sojourns in strange lands..." -- Barry Eisler

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description:
"Be sure <i>not</i> to discuss your hero's state of mind. Make it clear from his actions."
(<i>Letter to Alexander Chekhov</i>, May 10, 1886)" -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Donald Dale Jackson
item.description: "Every settlement with two shacks and a saloon gave itself a name: Helltown, Fair Play, Grizzly Flats, Piety Hill, Whiskey Flat, You Bet, Nary Red, Lousy Ravine, Petticoat Slide." -- Donald Dale Jackson

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by F.Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "You know, you’re a little complicated after all.” “Oh no,” she assured him hastily. “No, I’m not really - I’m just a - I’m just a whole lot of different simple people." -- F.Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Simon R Green
item.description: "Though I often run out of courage and good sense, stubbornness keeps me going." -- Simon R Green
